caption.p: Insights for tackling epidemics. The information in the rectangular boxes indicates how different components involved in tackling arboviruses epidemics linked to Ae. aegypti and Ae. albopictus relate with each other for better preparedness and strength to fight epidemics. The plus sign designates joint efforts, whereas the arrows indicate the key activities that will help to link research outputs to early warning and response capacity outcomes and disease control.
